column5: Very nice tribute Lew. My heartfelt condolences to you and your family.  Graham
Sorry Lew - my condolences to you and your family.

That's a tough blow, Lew. I had the pleasure of spending a long wknd on BOQ with the two brothers and that still is one of the best trips I've ever had. Ed and Lew are actually very, very much alike, easy to tell that they were brothers and close ones. Always quick with a laugh, always positive, totally at home in the outdoors (that was pretty apparent watching them fish that area of BOQ for three days). Ed was a master over that campstove/fire too. Spahghetti and meatballs with garlic bread was one of the best meals he did up....4 or 5 of us under a tarp they'd set up in a 3 day downpour and thoroughly enjoying the whole thing. An energetic and upbeat guy who will be missed by anyone and everyone he met, me included. What a great sample of pics Lew, you captured the man to a tee, excatly as I remember him, that's for sure. Hang in there Lew, we're all pulling for you.

This would be the fish'n trip your talkin about Dip, cold wet and miserable weather, but still an incredible time.  Don't think I've ever fished in such heavy rain in my entire life and Ed & I often laughed about how wet it was and how it never let up the whole time we were there.  I'll be continuing the Quinte tradition in Ed's honor next year and your always welcome Bud.
My sincere condolences
In my thoughts Lew.
Sorry to hear Lew.  My condolances to you and your family. Sincerely, -Graeme
Deepest sympathies for you and your family Lew.

Such sad news.  No doubt you and your brother are missing each other right now.  Thank you for sharing your love and your respect for someone so special to your heart.  I believe he will visit you, often.  And if he liked to play jokes on ya...well...you may find a lure in places you knew they just couldn't be.
I don't know how I didn't see this earlier!!! My deepest condolences Lew.  I am very sorry for your loss.  JP
I am truly sorry to hear that Lew.  Both of you will be in our prayers.  Take care bud. Speed

Not that my words will help much... My sincerest condolences to you and your Family. I enjoyed His posts and your brotherly exchanges.  Cancer is an awful desiese and has tolen to many loved ones.... I'll keep you and yours in my Prayers.
one giant un Lew smile  Lew you have one great family
Nice tribute in pictures of your brother.  Our condolences to you and your family and his family.  Dan and Valerie
A beautiful tribute to your brother. Please accept my deepest condolences Lew
Even in tragedy you continue to be a fantastic story teller Lew, almost feel like I knew your brother too! My deepest condolences to you and your family.
My condolences Lew.
Sorry for your loss
Couldn't imagine your pain. My condolences Lew.
Very nice tribute lew. Sounds like you were very good friends as well as family. My condolences.
Sincerest and deepest sympathies Lew.
Im so sorry for your loss!  I cant imagine losing my brother.  All the best to your and your family in your time of mourning.
Sorry To hear this Lew. My condolences.Looks like you guys shared alot of good times together, and have a lot of good memories.

Well Lew,  Like Roy put it, words are not enough....  Leslie and I wish to pass along our condolences for your loss......  Kaiser tipped me off..... as I have not been on the board much this winter/spring.... He told me I had better have a look....  Not happy with what I found...  but proud to be someone lucky enough to have spent a couple of hours fishing with Ed.....  These Knightons are a force to be reckoned with.... good people all....  You have many friends here and it is well deserved.....  It was a thrill seeing Ed bring in that little baby musky.... it was just fun... we boated one!... I truely enjoyed our afternoon together and am shadden by his passing....  I write this with tears streaming down my face.....   the capt

Lew I did not want to post again but I have to after Sheri posted for you... I have never met Sheri or your Wife Diane... But I do know One thing.. They both have BIG hearts just like Yours... Again I say.. I can not believe this is happening to you all again..
So sorry for your loss Lew.....you all will be in my prayers tonight.  dk
My deepest condolences to you and your family Lew.  Lovetofish
SORRY FOR YOUR LOSE LEW!!! A GREAT OFNER AND FRIEND TO MANY WILL BE LOST BUT NOT FORGOTTEN!!

Lew , we are very sorry for your loss,at this diffucult time,on behalf of fishergirl & myself please accept our sincerest condolences at this time,i hope you and your family,are ok,and that you get through this difficult time by remembering all the great memories of all the good times you had with your best freind and brother .take care lew,we are thinking of you and your family       shawn & julie

Lew, so sorry to hear of your loss. My condolences to both of your families. Just remember all the laughs you shared over the years & I'm sure that Eddy is already scouting out the best musky holes. Deb
Wow, I remember his dream house post and had no idea he was sick, he seemed like a great man I wish I had the chance to meet him.  I hope the best for you Lew and his family as well.

Lew, on behalf of Selena (H2Whao!) and I, we send our warmest condolences to you and your family.  Your warm heart, love, and compassion can be truly recognized, and we thank you for sharing your brothers life and his ability to positively impact you and your family, as well as this great community.  Life is a memory with high regards, and great device to remember who and what we love and cherish.  Russell
Sorry to hear about the loss of your brother Lew. My deepest condolences to you and your family. Rein
My deepest condolences to you and your family.

Such sad news.  I feel so sorry for you Lew.  I know you will miss him.  My sister is my best friend and we are always together.  I don't know what I would do without her.  You and your family will be in my prayers.  Pam

Once again folks, thank you all so very much for  your kind comments.  And Kevin, Ed truly enjoyed his time on the water with you last September and was looking forward to getting up there again this coming fall.
My deepest condolences go to you and your family Lew. You are a trully gentlmen and a class act. I am sure your brother was the same way
Lew our hearts go out to you and the family, a loss for all of us.

Lew, I've been busy for the past several days and when I saw your post I was shocked! My deepest condolences go to you and your family, the loss of a loved one, especially someone so young is devastating. You have suffered too much over the past few years. Be strong for yourself and your whole family. I never met Eddy, I only got to meet you at the Odessey and if your brother was anything like you, the world is a lesser place with his loss. My heart goes out to you.  Bruce

....A wonderful a and loving tribute to your brother Lew, thanks for taking the time to write and post it. I was so looking forward to meeting Ed this year as I'm sure he was every bit the gentleman you are.  My condolences to you and your family and Ed's family.
My deepest heartfelt condolences to your entire family Lew.  I know you'll keep the memories alive.  May Ed rest in peace.  Be well,  Stan
You have my deepest condolences Lew, I'm so sorry for your loss.

Lew my deepest condolences on the loss of your brother.  From the pictures you posted he sure did enjoy his times fishing with you.  Hold on to the memories of good times and I know he will always be with you on the water.
Very sorry to here of your loss Lew.You have are condolances.Dan
Great post, Lew, and it sounds like your brother was a great man.  So sad..
My deepest condolances Lew  Rick
My deepest condolences Lew  Dan
Sorry about your loss Lew,  I hope one day the cure for Cancer will be found. Your brother, (and thousands of others) deserved better.  Heartfelt Condolences from myself and my family.  Hookset.
Lew My condolences to you and your family from myself and all those at Fishhawk.net who exchanged messages with Eddy while he made his move to Delta.
Very sorry for your loss Lew. My brother and I fish together a lot as well. Its a reminder for me to cherish the time we spend together.
My thoughts are with you and your family.
Lew, My thoughts are with you
Hi Lew,  So sorry for you and Ed's familiy for the loss of a brother, best friend, fishing buddy and father. May he rest in peace.  Sincerely, Jim
Ahhh, such sad news Lew. My thoughts and prayers are with you.
My deepest condolences Lew.  My thoughts and prayers go out to you and your family.
My condolences Lew. . My thoughts are with you and your family
Very sorry for your loss Lew!   Chrispy!

sorry to hear of your lost Lew. as most of you know, i work for the city of Toronto too. if not you know now. so i feel your loss Lew for i have loss a city brother too, that sounds like a great man. take care Lew and all the best to your family. Chris Mcpherson

I'm so sorry to hear about this news, Lew, and to know that you and your family have had so much to deal with in the past few years.  Thank you for a wonderful tribute to your brother through your words and your photographs and memories.  Mike
Sorry to hear about your family's loss. I enjoyed his posts on conditions and wildlife around Port Hope when he was there. He will be missed by many.  Take care Lew,  ehg
My condolences to you Lew and your family on the loss of your brother. He will always be with you and surely missed. Mart
My condolences to you and your family Lew.
Once again Sorry for your loss Lew I know you and ed had many great memories and I enjoyed reading about alot of them and also headring them from you. His memory will always live on with you around.

That was a beautiful tribute. Very eloquently spoken. I'm really sorry to hear that he has passed and I feel for you Lew. It's not the same, but I lost my closest Aunt who I loved very dearly to cancer last year. She suffered too long. It was terrible to watch it happen, but I was glad to be by her side comforting her and my mother (her best friend) until the very end. It kind of puts things into perspective when things like that happen. It changes you. With me small things that would really annoy me seemed  almost insignificant after. Over time things seem to return to normal and I'm not sure that's a good thing. Thanks for reminding Lew. I really do feel terrible for you. You had a relationship with your brother that I haven't had with mine since we were teenagers. You were a very lucky man to have shared all that you did. From the respect and admiration you recieve here I know he was very lucky to have you as a brother. Peace be with you and your family Lew.
My deepest condolences Lew.
my condolences to you and family lew
lew as my family went to church yesterday we gladly lit a candle in honour of your loss.
A sad loss of a cherished sibling, my condolences to you and our family.
That is sad news indeed Lew! You've endured more loss in the past few years than some do in a lifetime. His contributions to this board will be missed.  My condolences to you Lew and his family.
I am very sorry for your loss lew. My condolences to you an your family. Your brother will always be with you! Stay strong.
I'm truly very sorry to hear of your loss Lew my condolenses go out to you and your family!!!!!!!!!!!
Lew I am at a total loss for words. My deepest condolances to you and your family Lew.  Regards, Sam
I am very saddened to hear of this news.  My condolonces to the families.

Thanks everyone for all your very kind words, both on this board, and the many e-mails and PM's I've received since yesterday.  Ed certainly enjoyed his time as a member of OFC and was looking forward to posting many fishing reports from his new home in the Rideau Lakes region.  He was an excellent angler, but was also a very accomplished golfer and enjoyed the game from the time he learned to play as a small child and continued with it his entire life.  This is one of my favorite pictures of Ed and was taken on a southern U.S. golf course a couple years ago.....check out the aligator laying in the water just behind him.  Thanks again everyone.
Our condolences and prayers go out to the entire Knighton family
I can't say I had the pleasure of meeting him, but I wish I had.... he was to young in my books!  My condolences go out to his friends and family!  UF

So sorry for your loss Lew. Great tribute to Ed, whom I had the pleasure of spending the weekend with last year at Quinte. He will always be in your heart Lew. Our thoughts and prayers are with you during this difficult time in the  Knighton family. God bless you Ed.
My Deepest condolences Lew
my condolences Lew

Lew you my friend have shouldered more family tragedy than anyone should in a short period of time. I am deeply sadden to hear the loss of your brother.  Thoughts and prayers are with the entire Knighton family  God Bless  Phil
All the best to you and yours during this time Lew! Sorry to hear!  Easton
Lew, very sorry for the loss, our thoughts and prayers are going out to your family and friends..
Very sorry to hear Lew.  Sherriff

Lew and Family... Please accept my condolences, from my family to yours. I never met him, but I did read his posts and he did seem to offer very sound advice, with honesty and care. We will miss him. HH
My deepest condolences Lew

My condolences to you Lew and your family.  I remember reading Ed's post a couple of months or so ago about buying his dream home and thinking that's the way to do it.  If you want something, then go for it.  Live your life to the fullest and enjoy each moment.  It's something I think we can all learn from.  He will certainly be missed my many.  Very sorry for you lost Lew.
Lew, I am so sorry. Please accept my deepest condolances, and know that we are here to support you in this time of sadness.
I am very sorry to here that Lew.  You've had a rough go of losing people that are close to you.  Not much can be said for matters like this.
My deepest condolences Lew.
My Deepest Condolances Lew ! Thanks for sharing that great tribute i know you will miss him but he will always be with you in mind and spirit. Most humble regards to you and your family. Mike

As I was reading through these posts this morning, the handle EddyK sounded oh so familiar.  The more I read the posts, there just had to be something more.  Then it hit me .... EddyK and I had exchanged some PM's a little while back when he was moving to Delta.  EddyK was asking about the area and the fishing.  I've stopped by Delta a couple times on my way to Rideau Ferry and we had a few exchanges.  His last PM was to invite me to stop by when I pass through the area this July and say HELLO and I was thinking of doing just that.  Dang (wish there was an emoticon with tears).
Our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family . Not sure what else to say that hasn't been already.  As you said enjoy the time you have with freinds and family .  dave

My condolences to you and your family Lew.  You certainly have been put to the test the last few years.  This is a very nice tribute you have written about your brother.  You have a relationship with him that would make anyone jealous, he sounds like a great guy.
Sorry Lew  Regards, Snowball
Sorry to hear Lew.  Very nice tribute, cherish the memories.  You and your family will be in my prayers.

I'm very sorry to hear about your brother Lew. It sounds like you have many thousands of hours of good times to reflect on, this is fortunate. Keep a place on the boat for him and I'm sure that there will be days when he will be there right along with you enjoying the good times in spirit.  Keep your chin up and his memory with you, enjoy every moment that you can. My best wishes are with you and your family.

Sorry to hear about your brother passing away Lew.  I am sure Ed will be with you in Spirit each and every fishing trip you go on from here on in.  Once again Lew; my deepest condolances.           Jim

I'm sorry to hear of the loss of a brother and friend, Lew.  Thanks to you, and to EddyK too, for showing us again that we are part of a larger community of friends.  I know that you will see this community pulling forward with you.  Best to you, Lew, and the other Knightons.

Ah jeez Lew...I've been wonderin' where you were...I'm so sorry to hear that. My thoughts are with you. I have an older Brother by 14 years thats my favorite fishing pardner and best friend, so I can imagine how hard this must be.

Sorry to hear about Eddy Lew...not the news I was hoping for...but at least he is not suffering anymore...nice tribute you made here about him.  He will always be in your heart along with your son and dad so cherish your memories of them...God Bless!
Very sorry to hear of your loss Lew,our thoughts and prayers will be for you and your family.  Bassman

wow - I cant believe I am reading this.... so sorry to hear - sorta noticed you've been post silent, was hoping you were just living things up at the trailer losing your sibling sucks - been there I enjoyed Ed's presence here - he seemed to be having fun with those north shore salmon last season  I know you will be strong for your family Lew - deepest sympathies,  Mark & Andrea
Very sorry to hear of your loss Lew. Sincere condolences from Barbara and myself.  John
My sympathies go out to you and your family, Lew.  Thank you for sharing your tribute to your Brother with your on-line family here at OFC.  We share in your sorrow.
This is real sad news. My deepest condolences to you and Ed's families. Let us know if there's anything we can do.
We're all going to miss Ed. RIP EddyK.  My condolensces to you and your family, Lew.

Lew, My condolences and deepest sympathy to yours and Eddy's family.  I didn't know Eddy but I did enjoy his post and comments.  He will be missed.  May the Lord be with all of you in this sad time and give you strength.  Tom
Sorry to hear Lew...We always enjoyed the posts from you and Eddy.  Another Guardian Angel for you.
My deepest condolences to you and your families.
It's always sad to lose a family member, especially one who was such a great fishing buddy.  My condolences to your's and Ed's family.

My first thought was "sorry to hear about your loss", but after reading your post "tribute", I think you guys were blessed. The loss will be the memories that could've been, but the blessing is the memories you have. God bless you, your family and your brothers family, may you all cherish his memories forever.

Lew,  You did a wonderful job honoring your brother and you certainly made me wish that I had a chance to meet him.  You've had more than your fair share of grief in the last little while, keep those positive memories in the forefront, thats how your brother and son would want it.  Lot's of people are thing of you and your family.....  Take care,  Davis

My sincere condolences Lew.I'm a "lurker" typically but you have had some very difficult hills to climb in the last few years and I fell compelled to reach out and say something.I truly hope you can overcome your personal losses.Few are tested as you have been Lew.God bless your families.
My condolences to you Lew.
Sorry for your loss Lew.
My friend, please accept my deepest condolences and my truest respect.
Lew I am so sorry for your loss, really do not know what to say to you. I know you are your brother were so close.  If you need anything please let me know

Geez Lew, I couldnt be more sadder! So sorry for your loss and your families... I have three brothers and I just couldnt imagine losing one of them! Please be strong today as you always have been and use your faith in God to get you through this tough time.
Holy Cow Lew ... I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your brother.  My deepest sympathy and prayers to you and your family.  Nice touch on posting the pics of you guys together.
Very sorry to hear of your loss Lew,condolences to you and the family,the best memmorys are those of good times in the outdoors, cherish those....  Brian
My deepest condolances Lew.  I'm so very sorry to hear about your loss.  My thoughts and prayers are with you.  Matt

So Sorry to hear Lew, my deepest condolences. I hope his suffering wasnt too long or too painful.  No words can adequately share the loss you feel, your pictures however are something to help you remember and share the joys you shared with him. Cherish them.  Looking forward, I am sure that every minute in your boat will be a minute spent with them all and every strike and every follow will be shared and watched upon and cheered by them.  This lifes a funny thing Lew ... I wonder how or when or even if it will ever all make sense
Chin up Lew, He knew you loved him. God Bless you & all his relations.
My condolences to you and your family  Dan
My Deepest condolences to both you and your family as well as to Ed's family  Regards, Bill
My condolances Lew and to your family.  I am sorry to hear about your loss.

My deepest heart felt condolences Lew, Eddy was a great guy and will be sorely missed by all that knew him.  He has gone to a better place now, no more pain or suffering.  I feel the pain of your loss.   Glen
You did a great job Honoring your brother. He was a great member of the board and will be remembered by many.
I'm sorry to hear the news Lew,he will be missed here.Great tribute to him,brothers are the best! Joe
Lew; so sorry to hear of your loss, I lost a brother last year ,so can empathise with you a little.  Please accept our condolences, to you and Eddies family!!  Jack

geez, i just joined this forum, and I don't know you or any one else here, but I am taken aback by this post...i feel for you...i have a brither too and I couldn't imagine losing him...  my sympathies to you and your family...  courage,  PP
I am very sorry to hear about your loss, My condolences to you and the family Lew,

Awww Dam!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  Was conversing with Ed through pm's just last month, April, about the Masters Tournament, know how much he enjoyed golf. But he did not tell me about this.   I am so sad now.  Condolences Lew, and all the Knighton family. My thoughts are with you all.
Lew,  I'm sorry for your loss, he'll be watching ya every time your out, fish hard every time!

Dang Lew, I can't tell you how sorry I am, your post is a wonderful tribute to a great man.  He will be missed.  I hope your mom is ok, nothing can be harder than losing a child I'm sure, no matter how old/young they are.  I only met her the once Lew, but my thoughts are with her too.  Take care Lew  Maureen
My deepest condolences to you and your entire family Lew.  Thanks for sharing some of your most precious memories of your brother and best friend.  He will be with you always.  FOTB
Very sorry to hear,  Prayers to your family    Frost
My condolences to you and your family.  matthew
My sympathies Lew
Sorry to hear that Lew. My condolences to you and your family
My thoughts and prayers to you and your family Lew.  An amazing tribute you have posted to Eddy.

So sad, very nice tribute from you Lew. Having been through the same thing in the not too distant past with my sister I feel your pain.  All the best to you and your's and Ed's family...  Take care,  Craig

I at a loss for words here Lew. How can life be so unfair, is what I'm thinking right now. I've always enjoyed Eddy's posts, especially the ones where you and him took a few jabs at each other. I don't have a brother, but to me the definition of brotherly love was spelled out in your posts. The tribute that you paid to Eddy was inspiring, to say the least. I'm sure that he was very, very proud of you.  My deepest sympathies to you and your family Lew.
